ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Rules and FAQ 2.3 - PLEASE READ THIS!
ygData.msgSnippet: Where is John Kim when we need him? Galtin of E ci ... From: Reeves, Patrick W [mailto:pwr3@pge.com] Sent: Friday, June 02, 2000 3:36 AM To:
ygData.messageBody:
Where is John Kim when we need him?

Galtin of E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Reeves, Patrick W [mailto:pwr3@...]
Sent: Friday, June 02, 2000 3:36 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Rules and FAQ 2.3 - PLEASE READ THIS!


The effects of the LoGP and the Gyspy Lute are not appearent till 47th lvl
when you get Niv's. Niv's with a regular lute adds 20 str. With a LoGP or
a Gypsy Lute it adds 21 str. This equals a 5% bonus.

One note on this, Gordon recently posted that the reason instruments to do
not list this is beacuse each song is effected DIFFERNTLY by magic
instruments. I need to make a few changes to my testing procedures to
account for this. Most likely I will just choose specific songs to for
testing. Do not want to test every song with every instrument. I'd rather
play the game :)

Rokenn
